doc.name: revZipReplaceItemWithData
doc.summary: Replaces the contents of an item in a zip archive with the contents of a variable.

description.p: Use the revZipReplaceItemWithData command to put the contents of a variable in your LiveCode program into one of the items of an open zip archive. The archive must have first been opened with the revZipOpenArchive command.
The archivePath is the absolute path to the zip archive to process.
The itemName is the name of the item in the zip archive to replace.
The variableName is the name of the variable in your program containing the data to replace with.
If the revZipReplaceItemWithData command encounters an error then the result will be set to an error code beginning with "ziperr", otherwise the result will be empty.
